reviewText: Well made stories, wonderful design and atmosphere, a well-balanced  mix of adventure, humor, and mystery. If you like cowboy bebop, this is a similar , though a less violent version, and set in a romanticized view of the past.
Extremely atmospheric and seductive. A dangerous and almost romantic aventure. Superb story, faithful to the graphic novel by Hugo Pratt. Stricking production with a killing music score. Unique.
